name: Weave Patterns
description: Learn the foundational and advanced weave movements to enhance poi spinning flow.

cards.title: Three-Beat Weave
cards.description: A fundamental poi weave pattern that involves crossing the arms and alternating sides.
bulletpoints: Keep elbows loose to allow smooth transitions
Use controlled wrist movements for better accuracy
Start slow and increase speed gradually

cards.title: Reverse Weave
cards.description: A movement where the weave pattern is reversed, adding complexity to transitions.
bulletpoints: Begin with slow reverse motions before attempting full flow
Maintain rhythm and timing between both poi
Experiment with transitioning between forward and reverse weaves
